Html:
Hi.. I'm a newbie to VB.NET and want to use HTMLAgility in VB.NET 2005 Project . Any hints please..

Thanks and Regards,
Rajeev.
You need C# for HTMLAgility for any things like compile or error/bugfixing. In VB.NET the you can add a reference to the compiled binary (DLL/Assembly) of HTMLAgility to use it.
